remediesPage.selectPlanetPrompt: Select a planet to view remedies.

Sun.vedicMantra: Om Aakrishnen Rajasa Vartamano Niveshyann Amritam Martyan Ch | Hiranyayen Savita Rathenaa Devo Yati Bhuvnani Pashyan ||
Sun.beejaMantra: Om Hraam Hreem Hraum Sah Suryay Namah ||
Sun.charity: Wheat, Jaggery, Copper, Gold, Red Clothes on Sunday
Sun.deity: Lord Shiva, Lord Vishnu (as Surya Narayana)
Sun.other: Offer water (Arghya) to the Sun in the morning. Respect father and elders. Maintain discipline.

Moon.vedicMantra: Om Imam Deva Asapatnam Suvaddhyam Mahate Ksatraya Mahate Jyesthyaya Mahate Janarajyayendrasyendriyay...
Moon.beejaMantra: Om Shraam Shreem Shraum Sah Chandray Namah ||
Moon.charity: Rice, Sugar, Silver, White Clothes, Milk, Curd on Monday
Moon.other: Respect mother and motherly figures. Drink water in a silver glass. Avoid emotional extremes.

Mars.vedicMantra: Om Agnir Murdha Divah Kakutpatih Prithivya Ayam | Apam Retamsi Jinvati ||
Mars.beejaMantra: Om Kraam Kreem Kraum Sah Bhaumay Namah ||
Mars.charity: Masoor Dal (Red Lentils), Jaggery, Red Clothes, Copper on Tuesday
Mars.other: Donate blood (if healthy). Control anger. Engage in physical activity.

Mercury.vedicMantra: Om Udbudhyasvagne Prati Jagrhi Tvam Ishtapurte Sam Srijetham Ayam Cha...
Mercury.beejaMantra: Om Braam Breem Braum Sah Budhay Namah ||
Mercury.charity: Green Moong Dal, Green Clothes, Green Vegetables, Bangles on Wednesday
Mercury.other: Feed green fodder to cows. Maintain good communication. Read books.

Jupiter.vedicMantra: Om Brihaspate Ati Yadaryo Arhad Dyumad Vibhati Kratumaj Janeshu | Yad Didayach Chavas Ritaprajat Tadasmasu Dravinam Dhehi Chitram ||
Jupiter.beejaMantra: Om Graam Greem Graum Sah Gurve Namah ||
Jupiter.charity: Chana Dal (Bengal Gram), Turmeric, Yellow Clothes, Yellow Sweets, Books on Thursday
Jupiter.other: Respect teachers and elders. Apply turmeric tilak. Maintain optimism and wisdom.

Venus.vedicMantra: Om Annatparisruto Rasam Brahmana Vyapibat Kshatram Payah Somam Prajapatih...
Venus.beejaMantra: Om Draam Dreem Draum Sah Shukray Namah ||
Venus.charity: Rice, Sugar, Ghee, White Clothes, Curd, Silver, Perfume on Friday
Venus.other: Maintain cleanliness. Appreciate beauty and art. Respect women.

Saturn.vedicMantra: Om Sham No Devir Abhishtaya Aapo Bhavantu Pitaye | Sham Yorabhi Sravantu Nah ||
Saturn.beejaMantra: Om Praam Preem Praum Sah Shanaishcharay Namah ||
Saturn.charity: Black Sesame Seeds, Urad Dal (Black Gram), Black Clothes, Mustard Oil, Iron items on Saturday
Saturn.other: Serve the poor and needy. Be disciplined and patient. Avoid laziness.

Rahu.vedicMantra: Om Kaya Nashchitra Aa Bhuvaduti Sadavridhah Sakha | Kaya Shachishthaya Vrita ||
Rahu.beejaMantra: Om Bhraam Bhreem Bhraum Sah Rahave Namah ||
Rahu.charity: Urad Dal, Coconut, Lead, Black Clothes, Mustard Oil on Saturday
Rahu.other: Avoid intoxication and deception. Serve leprosy patients. Maintain clarity of thought.

Ketu.vedicMantra: Om Ketum Krinvan Aketave Pesho Marya Apeshase | Samushad Bhirjayathah ||
Ketu.beejaMantra: Om Sraam Sreem Sraum Sah Ketave Namah ||
Ketu.charity: Black Sesame Seeds, Urad Dal, Blanket (multi-colored), Mustard Oil, Knife on Tuesday/Saturday
Ketu.other: Feed stray dogs. Donate blankets. Practice detachment and spirituality.

samvatsaras.Mars in house 7 from Ascendant. Mars in: Mars in house 7 from Ascendant. Mars in house 7 (by Rashi count) from Moon.
samvatsaras.Planets are found on both sides of the R: Planets are found on both sides of the Rahu-Ketu axis
samvatsaras.Moon is in Purva Bhadrapada, which is no: Moon is in Purva Bhadrapada, which is not a Gand Mool Nakshatra

doshaReasons.planetsBothSidesRahuKetu: Planets are found on both sides of the Rahu-Ketu axis
doshaReasons.moonNotInGandMool: {{0}} is in {{1}}, which is not a Gand Mool Nakshatra
doshaReasons.planetNotFoundInHousesFrom: {{0}} not found in dosha-causing houses ({{1}}) from {{2}}
doshaReasons.moonInGandMool: {{0}} is in {{1}}, which is a Gand Mool Nakshatra
